member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraReports.Web.ASPxReportDesigner.ShouldClearReportScripts

summary.para: Specifies whether to remove script code from report definition files when saving them in the Web Report Designer.

Security note: Saving report scripts that can be received from the client may introduce security-related issues because report scripts are not secure. We recommend that you enable script cleaning to avoid possible risks.
Review the following help topic for information on how to mitigate risks related to report scripts: Scripts Security

member.value: true to clear report scripts; otherwise, false.

member.value: An integer value that specifies the tab panel position.

summary.para: Provides additional client-side events to an .
Initializes a new instance of the class with the default settings.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraReports.Web.WebDocumentViewerClientSideEvents.CustomizeElements

summary.para: Gets or sets the name of the JavaScript function or the entire code which will handle the ASPxClientWebDocumentViewer.CustomizeElements event.

member.value: A string, specifying either the name of a JavaScript function or the entire JavaScript function code used to handle the corresponding event.
